ComicInfo.Summary: Wildstorm Rising Chapter 8: Defile tricks Backlash into battling Helspont all by his lonesome. After getting his butt handed to him by the bad guy and being unceremoniously dumped in the ocean, Backlash is picked up by his old team, Stormwatch.
ComicInfo.Title: Wildstorm Rising Chapter 8
